abstract: Manhattan art dealer Louis K Meisel has been primary force behind development of Salon Series, concerts featuring young violinists and pianists in intimate, chatty sessions; held in Parrish Art Museum's theater, concerts present classical and contemporary music in setting that presents inspiration of visual arts as well (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Since 2013, Louis K. Meisel, a Manhattan art dealer, has worked with the Parrish Art Museum to produce similarly intimate, chatty concerts, featuring young violinists and pianists playing both classical and contemporary works, while surrounded by art.

headline.main: The Art of Music and Conversation
headline.print_headline: The Art of Music and Conversation
